channel.title: → RhinoCraft ← Tekkit • EE enabled • Active Community • Survival
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/47nau7o0z/Rhinocraft.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER] [/CENTER] [LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/3sc11723n/welcome.png[/img][/LEFT] [LEFT]Welcome to the world of Rhinocraft. Rhinocraft is a server which strives[/LEFT] [LEFT]to a survival gameplay. This means nearly no game altering, for a Vanilla-Tekkit[/LEFT] [LEFT]experience. We are seeking people who are searching for a server to survival build.[/LEFT] [LEFT]This means, survival without PVP or griefing.[/LEFT] [LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/fzb650in7/connect.png[/img][/LEFT] [LEFT][B]Server Adress: [/B]188.40.37.82:26245[/LEFT]
[LEFT][B]Upgrade guide to 3.1.1 can be found [URL=http://'http://forums.technicpack.net/threads/how-to-upgrade-your-tekkit-client-to-3-1-1.16684/']HERE[/URL][/B][/LEFT] [LEFT] [/LEFT] [LEFT]And please, I can't stress this enough. Before joining[/LEFT] [LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/76ysv2mw3/upgrade.png[/img][/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT] [LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/fl9u5eyjn/spawn_text.png[/img][/LEFT] [LEFT]Our server has a plain spawn. It's a plain area where players can directly build as soon as they leave the building.[/LEFT] [LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][B]The spawn[/B][/LEFT] [LEFT][B][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/wgoz4f49v/spawn.png[/img][/B][/LEFT] [LEFT] [/LEFT] [LEFT][B]Edit: [/B]New spawn currently under construction, this one doesn't exist anymore.[/LEFT] [LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][B][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/se2jj2zj7/timezone.png[/img][/B][/LEFT] [LEFT]The server is hosted in Berlin.[/LEFT] [LEFT]Timezone: [B]GMT +1[/B][/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT] [LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/9zs0f3n8j/map.png[/img][/LEFT] [LEFT]Our map is generated with the seed "Earth" (without the quotes).[/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT] [LEFT][IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/3n89riusj/features.png[/img][/LEFT] [LEFT]Our server has the following to offer:[/LEFT]
[ul][li]Survival gameplay[/li] [li]Area protection for building[/li] [li]Can hold up to 20 people.[/li] [li]Equivalent Exchange[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/oy5tvscwz/plugins.png[/img] In order to optimize the gameplay we've installed a couple of plugins:
[ul][li][S]CoreProtect[/S][/li] [li]Essentials[/li] [li]LWC[/li] [li]MineBackup[/li] [li]ModReq[/li] [li]MyHome[/li] [li]NoItem[/li] [li]Residence[/li] [li]WorldBorder[/li] [li]sWatchdog[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/lm2xoqvs3/blocked.png[/img] Only the Alchemical Chest and the Red Matter Furnace are blocked from being placed. Except these items, you're free to craft and place whatever you want, even nukes. You can also craft the Energy Condenser, because you can still craft the Alchemical Chest.
[IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/z9i6og4mb/rules.png[/img] In order to keep everything fun, we set up a couple of rules:
[ul][li]Don't grief[/li] [li]Don't PVP[/li] [li]Don't flame[/li][/ul]
Those were the rules, quite simple aren't they?
[IMG]http://s19.postimage.org/qanixoacj/end.png[/img] We hope that you will try out our server and are looking forward to see you on our server.

item.title: → RhinoCraft ← Tekkit • EE enabled • Active Community • Survival
item.dc:creator: @Alkali Alkali
item.description:
@Alkali wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[CENTER] [/CENTER]
[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]Welcome to the world of Rhinocraft. Rhinocraft is a server which strives[/LEFT]
[LEFT]to a survival gameplay. This means nearly no game altering, for a Vanilla-Tekkit[/LEFT]
[LEFT]experience. We are seeking people who are searching for a server to survival build.[/LEFT]
[LEFT]This means, survival without PVP or griefing.[/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT]

[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]Server Adress: 188.40.37.82:26245[/LEFT]

[LEFT]Upgrade guide to 3.1.1 can be found HERE[/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT]And please, I can’t stress this enough. Before joining[/LEFT]
[LEFT][/LEFT]

[LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]Our server has a plain spawn. It’s a plain area where players can directly build as soon as they leave the building.[/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT]

[LEFT]The spawn[/LEFT]
[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT]Edit: New spawn currently under construction, this one doesn’t exist anymore.[/LEFT]
[LEFT] [/LEFT]

[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]The server is hosted in Berlin.[/LEFT]
[LEFT]Timezone: GMT +1[/LEFT]

[LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]Our map is generated with the seed “Earth” (without the quotes).[/LEFT]

[LEFT] [/LEFT]
[LEFT][/LEFT]
[LEFT]Our server has the following to offer:[/LEFT]

[ul][li]Survival gameplay[/li]
[li]Area protection for building[/li]
[li]Can hold up to 20 people.[/li]
[li]Equivalent Exchange[/li][/ul]


In order to optimize the gameplay we’ve installed a couple of plugins:

[ul][li]CoreProtect[/li]
[li]Essentials[/li]
[li]LWC[/li]
[li]MineBackup[/li]
[li]ModReq[/li]
[li]MyHome[/li]
[li]NoItem[/li]
[li]Residence[/li]
[li]WorldBorder[/li]
[li]sWatchdog[/li][/ul]


Only the Alchemical Chest and the Red Matter Furnace are blocked from being placed.
Except these items, you’re free to craft and place whatever you want, even nukes.
You can also craft the Energy Condenser, because you can still craft the Alchemical Chest.


In order to keep everything fun, we set up a couple of rules:

[ul][li]Don’t grief[/li]
[li]Don’t PVP[/li]
[li]Don’t flame[/li][/ul]

Those were the rules, quite simple aren’t they?


We hope that you will try out our server and are looking forward to see
you on our server.

Read full topic
